title: Explosive utilization efficiency enhancement: An application of machine learning for powder factor prediction using critical rock characteristics
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Blessing Olamide Taiwo, Angesom Gebretsadik, Hawraa H. Abbas, Mohammad Khishe, Yewuhalashet Fissha, Esma Kahraman, Ahsan Rabbani, Adams Abiodun Akinlabi
